Question: Coatema Coating Machinery GmbH CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Coatema Coating Machinery GmbH

CES 2024 Product Highlights:

- Equipment for the production of PE
- Product presentations: Coatema Easycoater, Smartcoater, Test Solution, Click&Coat
- Lamination, quality/process control, roll-to-roll processing
- Other manufacturing processes: ink-jet printing, IR drying, UV curing, laser processes, gravure printing, flexographic printing, screen printing, other mass patterning techniques, nano imprint, dip coating, blade coating, other solution coating
- Suitable for plastic films, paper, glass, textiles
- R&D / Research & Development

Coatema offers laboratory, pilot, and production machinery, as well as custom-made machines and single units. Their lab2fab concept allows for the creation of product samples, series production, and scale-up processes for emerging markets and high-tech industries. The company specializes in coating, printing, and laminating machinery for various sectors, including renewable energies, printed electronics, sustainable packaging, medical and pharmaceutical, membranes, composites, technical textiles, battery technologies, and fuel cell technologies.
Summary_cn:
Coatema Coating Machinery GmbH(柯特马涂层机械有限公司)

CES 2024产品亮点：

- 用于PE生产的设备
- 产品展示：Coatema Easycoater，Smartcoater，Test Solution，Click&Coat
- 层压，质量/工艺控制，卷对卷加工
- 其他制造工艺：喷墨打印，IR干燥，UV固化，激光工艺，凹版印刷，柔性版印刷，丝网印刷，其他大规模图案技术，纳米压印，浸涂，刀涂，其他溶液涂层
- 适用于塑料薄膜、纸张、玻璃、纺织品
- 研发/研究与开发

Coatema提供实验室、试验和生产机械，以及定制机器和单机装置。他们的实验室到工厂（lab2fab）概念可以在新兴市场和高科技产业中创建产品样本、系列生产和规模化过程。该公司专门从事涂层、印刷和层压机械，适用于可再生能源、印刷电子、可持续包装、医药和制药、膜、复合材料、技术纺织品、电池技术和燃料电池技术等各个领域。
